Name: NeoCube
About the game: About the game: Neocube is the puzzle game in which you try to find a way to pass a number of test chambers by using the unique features of a cube. Features: - Neocube is created for testing the Artificial Intellect developed by OZOSTU Labs. - 30 test chambers to pass and wreck your brains in the process Story: OZOSTU Labs created the new kind of Artificial Intelligence. Lab 23 tests the AI through the special test-chambers by using the unusual cube.
